Author: ThatChicBitch
Text: A family friend of mine has cancer and they were telling me about how difficult it is for them to hold food down but that they really missed the taste of it so I said (and you already know where I'm going with this one), and I quote, "you could just chew and spit them, though?"  It was a humid day. The A/C was on blast. No one heard me. I'm not even Catholic anymore but thank Peter, Mary and Paul for loud air conditioners.
